descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#000000][size=6][u][b]- Install [/b][b]A[/b][b]fter The Wolf Q[/b][b]u[/b][b]een Awakened [/b][b]Q[/b][/u][/size][b][size=6][u]uest -[/u][/size][/b][/color][/center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]This mod introduces many small things which follow the closure of Wolf Queen Awakened quest.
[/size][/font]
[b][u][color=#000000][size=4]Spells :
[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Introduces new conjuration spells,which you can buy atAlexandra,at Solitude streets.She is kind of apprentice in Potema magic.
Following conjuration Spells : 
[/size][/font]
[size=2][font=Courier New]- Extraterrestrial Invasion [i](Conjure three chaurus riepers)[/i]
- Freezing Stare [i](Conjure triad of ice wraiths)[/i]
- Lunar Embrace [i](Conjure three corrupted shades)[/i]
- Conjure Vampiric Twins [i](summons two vampire fledgings)[/i]
- Conjure Potema's Advisor [i](summons an draugr overlord,armed with daedric warhammer)[/i]
- Conjure Lich [i](Necromancer Shade Priest)[/i]
- Conjure Necromancer Morcalavin [i](Dragon Priest)[/i]
- Conjure Skeleton Brothers [i](Two Armored Skeletons)[/i][/font][i] 
[/i][/size]-   [size=2][font=Courier New]Conjure Wisp Mother[/font]
[/size]

[color=#000000][size=4][b][u]Potema's Perks  :
[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Ten new perks at Conjuration perk tree :
[/size][/font]
[font=Courier New][size=2]1.Trinity Fields - [i]You can summon up to three[/i]
2.Necromancy Choice - [i]Which Gives You 6 New Magic Effects.   [/i]   
        [i] Effect I : Increased Magicka By 100 pts   
         Effect II : Fortified Magicka Regeneration By 30%   
         Effect III. Poison Resistant 100%          
         Effect IV : 30% All Magic Resistant
[/i]         Effect V : Damaged Health By 50 pts.
         Effect VI : Damaged Health Reg. by 5%
3.Quiet casting  is removed from illusion into conjuration
4.Infernal Bond - Summon FLame Duo,Summon Flaming Orb,Summon Flame Mistress
5.Dread Summons - Summon Fiend Anomaly,Summon Death Hound,Summon Gargoyle
6.Improved Concentration - Cast conjuration spells at any distance
7.Amplified Conjuration -Conjuration spells and effects last longer
8.Call Of Ancestor - Gain power to summon Ancestral Spirit to fight for you once per day
9.Reclaim Magicka - Deaths within 100 ft. reclaim magicka to replenish yours
10.Soul Harvest -  gain 50 soul energy when living foe dies,granting an soul burst power at 1000 soul energies.[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]Six new perks at Illusion perk tree :[/b][/size][/font]

[font=Courier New]1.Possession Knowledge - gain mind vision and mind control spells
2.Intervention Knowledge - gain Mark/Recall spell
3.False Twin Knowledge - gain False Twin spell
4.Amplify Illusion - illusion spells and effects last longer
5.Infinitive Magic - novice spells cost no magic
6.Eclipse - gain eclipse power[/font]


[b][u][font=Georgia][color=#000000][size=4]New Quests :

[/size][/color][/font][/u][/b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b][color=#000000]1. [/color]The Potema's Memoars [/b][/size][/font]
[i][font=Times New Roman]If you pickpocket Alexandra you can find an note wich contains locations of five Potema's books,
[/font][/i][i][font=Times New Roman]the Chronichles of Dusk,which increase your conjuration skill and also look very nice together in collection. [/font][/i]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b][color=#000000]2. [/color]The Scythe Of Potema[/b][/size][/font]
[i][font=Times New Roman]Find an note in Wolfskull Cave and travel to ghost ship Orion and reclaim scythe of Potema.[/font][/i]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b][color=#000000]3.[/color] Potema Immitation[/b][/size][/font]
[i][font=Times New Roman]Ask the Barkeeper at Winking Skeever for news,and recieve quest to challenge and defeat and Immitator of Potema.[/font][/i]


[b][u][b][u][font=Georgia][color=#000000][size=4]New Shouts :
[/size][/color][/font][/u][/b][/u][/b]
[b][color=#000000][size=3]1.[/size][/color] Liquidate[i] (Liquid - A - Te )[/i] -[/b] [i]Damage targets health singifically[/i] [u](200,300,400)[/u]
[b][i]Locations[/i] : 1.[/b] Darkwater Cave
                   [b] 2.[/b] Black Briar Manor basement
                 [b]   3.[/b] Blackreach

[color=#000000][size=3][b]2.[/b][/size][/color] [b]Summon Spectral Valkyrie[i] (Valk - Ar - Io)[/i] - [/b][i]Summons an spectral Valkyrie[/i] [u](15,30,45)[/u]
[b][i]Locations :[/i]  1.[/b] Midden,College Of W.
                   [b]  2.[/b] Burned Manor at Rift
                    [b] 3.[/b] Near Malacath Statue

[b][color=#000000][size=3]3. [/size][/color]Aspect Of An Knight [i] (A - Ri - Se) [/i][/b]- Increase Health by 100 pts,Stamina And Magicka Reg By 150%,Magic Resistant 50% [u](15,30,45)[/u]
[i][b]Locations :[/b][/i]  [b]1.[/b] One Dwarven Ruin
                     [b]2.[/b] Statue to Clavicus Ville
                   [b]  3.[/b] Stepfall Burrow

[color=#000000][size=3][b]4. [/b][/size][/color][b]Aspect Of Taurus[i] (Tau - Ro - Saa)[/i][/b] - [i]health reg. 125% faster,one handed skill increased by 80 pts,reflect 20 % damage[/i] [u](30,45,60)[/u]
[b][i]Locations :  [/i]1.[/b] Tolvad's Crossing
                     [b] 2.[/b] Basement
                     [b] 3. [/b]Black Peak above Boethiah's shrine








[color=#ffffff][size=3][u]Crediteria :[/u]
[/size][/color]
author: ibrica15
